name: Charatale (Angelfoxy prod.)
description:
Run, Jump, and Escape of the underground... again, but this time with Chara.
and well thats it the game

The history of Charatale: The pacifist route has come to an end and finally Frisk and the monsters can live happily together with humans after an absolute peace agreement between them... years have passed since then, the subsoil has been destroyed and in ruins due to the abandonment of it by the monsters, some time later Chara fell back into the subsoil having to cross all over it again, but with the difference that this one is even more destroyed than before and it is more difficult to get out of it, at the same time, Frisk enters the underground, but not unintentionally, he/she wanted to see the underground one more time before it is collapsed, because, it will be collapsed in a short time time so that no one can fall again and get trapped, besides, it's going to fall anyway, so Frisk decides to visit this place, and walking through snowdin he finds Chara on the... Discover the full story playing the game when it is complete

well, and sayed that, enjoy! =)
